original_text: These were all commended for their faith, yet none of them received what had been promised,
korean_text: 이 사람들은 다 믿음으로 말미암아 증거를 받았으나 약속된 것을 받지 못하였으니

sentences.original_text: These were all commended for their faith
yet none of them received what had been promised
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 그들 중 누구도 약속된 것을 받지 못했다
